sub_rules.content: The source file name consists of the case-sensitive name of the top-level class it contains (of which there is exactly one), plus the .java extension.
sub_rules.relationship: 数量限定关系=>包含关系
sub_rules.formalization: the quantity of top_level_class must be equal to 1 => source_file.name must contain top_level_class.name + .java
